summary: This document is an email exchange between Lisa D. Hurd and Amanda Kirby regarding the receipt of shares and funds related to Southern Financial. The correspondence indicates that the shares have been received and will be posted to the account, suggesting a financial transaction is being finalized.

persons.name: Lisa D Hurd
persons.context: Lisa D. Hurd is communicating about the receipt of shares and funds related to Southern Financial.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is involved in the correspondence regarding the financial transactions and is seeking to discuss further with Lisa.

connections.description: Both individuals work at Deutsche Bank, with Lisa in Private Wealth Management and Amanda as an Associate.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, New York, NY, USA
keyFacts: The shares related to Southern Financial have been received and will be posted to the account.
A regular M4 fund was received via wire the previous day.
The email indicates that the financial transactions are nearing completion.
